title: Watch Face Clockster
summary: Clockster (CLOCK + roadSTER) - watch face for fans of sports cars and roadsters.

description: Watch face for smartwatches with steps counter, AM/PM indicator and battery level.Supported for most modern smartwatch models: moto360 2nd gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3 and others. Working fine on other oldest models: LG G W100, R W110, Asus Zen Watch and others.- digital hours/minutes; analog seconds- date (month, week)- watch battery level- steps counter- 12/24 hours mode- 24h (AM/PM) dial- Weather (forecast 4 days)- Calendar (tap on date area for opening Calendar).Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face for smartwatches with steps counter, AM/PM indicator and battery level.
Supported for most modern smartwatch models: moto360 2nd gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3 and others. Working fine on other oldest models: LG G W100, R W110, Asus Zen Watch and others.

- digital hours/minutes; analog seconds
- date (month, week)
- watch battery level
- steps counter
- 12/24 hours mode
- 24h (AM/PM) dial
- Weather (forecast 4 days)
- Calendar (tap on date area for opening Calendar).

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.

Warning: this watch face ONLY for ANDROID WEAR smartwatches.
comments: I like the design, fits well on Sony SWR50
Simple and Elegant Please add changeable background option
??? Downloaded on my motog but not visible in the app drawer.  After downloading,  where has it gone?
Looks good and works well. Would get that fifth star if I could change the color.
recentChanges: - New "Weather" function, only forecast for 4 days.
Important: for working needed permission for "Location Service".
- New built-in "Calendar" (tap on date number area)
